sentences.sContent: Yesterday's decision will infuriate Turkey and Brazil, who will see it as the established powers quashing a genuine attempt at mediation by two new voices on the world stage.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yesterday's decision will infuriate Turkey and Brazil, who will see it as the established powers quashing a genuine attempt at mediation by two new voices on the world stage.
sentences.sCn: 昨日的决定会激怒土耳其和巴西，它们会把它视为公认的大国宣布世界舞台上两个新的声音所作的一次真正的和解尝试无效。

sentences.sContent: A research paper published alongside the HMIC report will infuriate Home Office ministers who have been arguing there is no direct link between falling police numbers and levels of crime.
sentences.sContent_eng: A research paper published alongside the HMIC report will infuriate Home Office ministers who have been arguing there is no direct link between falling police numbers and levels of crime.
sentences.sCn: 和HMIC的报告同时发表的一篇文章可能会激怒内务大臣们，大臣们一直坚称在降低的警察人数和犯罪率之间没有直接联系。
